speaker: speaker1
text: Excuse me , what's the screen near your steering wheel for ?

speaker: speaker2
text: It's a portable TV . It's a popular thing now .

speaker: speaker1
text: Oh , that's new to me . So what's on everyday ?

speaker: speaker2
text: News about current affairs , documentaries , music , movies , noncommercial ads and so on .

speaker: speaker2
text: Yes , there are something good and informative . I think that many people underestimate the value of TV in education .

speaker: speaker1
text: I agree . Are there any commercials on the TV ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Of course . Because the TV stations need to make money from commercials between the programs .

speaker: speaker1
text: That makes a lot of sense . Does the TV work well ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Not always . It depends on the transmission of the satellite signals .

speaker: speaker1
text: I got it . Do you pay for the programs ?
